content.query:
--CREATE VIEW [dbo].[County_Cardio_Disease] AS
SELECT [California County] as County, 
SUM(cast([Cardiovascular Disease] as FLOAT)) as [Cardio Disease]
FROM [dbo].[calenviroscreen]
group by [California County]

--CREATE VIEW [dbo].[County_Covid_Deaths] AS
SELECT
[area] as County, cast([cumulative_deaths] as FLOAT) as [Covid Deaths]
 FROM [dbo].[Covid19CasesTest]
 where area_type != 'State' and date = '' 

SELECT c.County, c.[Cardio Disease], 
d.[Covid Deaths]
from dbo.County_Cardio_Disease c, dbo.County_Covid_Deaths d
where c.County = d.County
order by d.[Covid Deaths] desc

--CREATE VIEW [dbo].[County_Cardio_Disease] AS
SELECT [California County] as County, 
--, [ZIP]
--, [Nearby City (to help approximate location only)]
SUM(cast([Cardiovascular Disease] as FLOAT)) as [Cardio Disease]
--, [Cardiovascular Disease Pctl]
FROM [dbo].[calenviroscreen]
--where [California County] = 'Ventura'
group by [California County]
--order by [Cardio Disease] desc

--CREATE VIEW [dbo].[County_Covid_Deaths] AS
SELECT
--[date]
[area] as County, cast([cumulative_deaths] as FLOAT) as [Covid Deaths]
--[cumulative_deaths]
 FROM [dbo].[Covid19CasesTest]
 where area_type != 'State' and date = '' 
 --and area = 'Los Angeles' 


select c.County, c.[Cardio Disease], 
--cast(d.[Covid Deaths] as numeric)
--convert(decimal(18,2),[Covid Deaths])
--d.[Covid Deaths] as numeric
--isNumeric(d.[Covid Deaths])
d.[Covid Deaths]
from dbo.County_Cardio_Disease c, dbo.County_Covid_Deaths d
where c.County = d.County
order by d.[Covid Deaths] desc

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE rayfelipedlgen2account
WITH ( LOCATION = 'https://rayfelipedlgen2account.dfs.core.windows.net')

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects O JOIN sys.schemas S ON O.schema_id = S.schema_id WHERE O.NAME = 'NYCTaxiTripSmall' AND O.TYPE = 'U' AND S.NAME = 'dbo')
CREATE TABLE dbo.NYCTaxiTripSmall
    (
     [DateID] float,
     [MedallionID] float,
     [HackneyLicenseID] float,
     [PickupTimeID] float,
     [DropoffTimeID] float,
     [PickupGeographyID] float,
     [DropoffGeographyID] float,
     [PickupLatitude] float,
     [PickupLongitude] float,
     [PickupLatLong] nvarchar(4000),
     [DropoffLatitude] float,
     [DropoffLongitude] float,
     [DropoffLatLong] nvarchar(4000),
     [PassengerCount] int,
     [TripDurationSeconds] int,
     [TripDistanceMiles] float,
     [PaymentType] nvarchar(4000),
     [FareAmount] numeric(19,4),
     [SurchargeAmount] numeric(19,4),
     [TaxAmount] numeric(19,4),
     [TipAmount] numeric(19,4),
     [TollsAmount] numeric(19,4),
     [TotalAmount] numeric(19,4)
    )
WITH
    (
    DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
     CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
     -- HEAP
    )
GO

COPY INTO dbo.NYCTaxiTripSmall
(DateID 1, MedallionID 2, HackneyLicenseID 3, PickupTimeID 4, DropoffTimeID 5,
PickupGeographyID 6, DropoffGeographyID 7, PickupLatitude 8, PickupLongitude 9, 
PickupLatLong 10, DropoffLatitude 11, DropoffLongitude 12, DropoffLatLong 13, 
PassengerCount 14, TripDurationSeconds 15, TripDistanceMiles 16, PaymentType 17, 
FareAmount 18, SurchargeAmount 19, TaxAmount 20, TipAmount 21, TollsAmount 22, 
TotalAmount 23)
FROM 'https://rayfelipedlgen2account.dfs.core.windows.net/rayfelipedlgen2filesystem/Quickstarts/NYCTripSmall-Jan2021.parquet'
WITH
(
    FILE_TYPE = 'PARQUET'
    ,MAXERRORS = 0
    ,IDENTITY_INSERT = 'OFF'
)

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://datalakaeacctindemorg.dfs.core.windows.net/bscccontainer/CDFW_Facilities.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [result]

CREATE VIEW [dbo].[County_Cardio_Disease] AS
SELECT [California County] as County, 
SUM(cast([Cardiovascular Disease] as FLOAT)) as [Cardio Disease]
FROM [dbo].[calenviro]
group by [California County]


CREATE VIEW [dbo].[County_Covid_Deaths] AS
SELECT
[area] as County, cast([cumulative_deaths] as FLOAT) as [Covid Deaths]
 FROM [dbo].[covid_testcases]
 where area_type != 'State' and date IS NULL


select c.County, c.[Cardio Disease], 
d.[Covid Deaths]
from dbo.County_Cardio_Disease c, dbo.County_Covid_Deaths d
where c.County = d.County
order by d.[Covid Deaths] desc

SELECT passenger_count,
      SUM(trip_distance) as SumTripDistance,
      AVG(trip_distance) as AvgTripDistance
--INTO dbo.PassengerCountStats
FROM  dbo.NYCTripSmall
WHERE trip_distance > 0 AND passenger_count > 0
GROUP BY passenger_count;
SELECT * FROM dbo.PassengerCountStats
ORDER BY passenger_count;

SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://rayfelipedlgen2account.dfs.core.windows.net/rayfelipedlgen2filesystem/Quickstarts/NYCTripSmall-Feb2022.parquet',
        FORMAT='PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]

SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
            BULK '/rayfelipedlgen2filesystem/Quickstarts/NYCTripSmall.parquet',
            DATA_SOURCE = 'rayfelipedlgen2account',
            FORMAT='PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]

CREATE PROC [dbo].[UpdatePaymentType]
AS
BEGIN
UPDATE [dbo].[greentaxi]
SET PaymentType = 2
END

CREATE PROC [dbo].[update_covid_gender_unknown_sp]
AS
BEGIN
UPDATE [dbo].[bscc_covid_bygender]
SET demographic_value = 'Unknown'
WHERE demographic_value = 'Total'
END

source:
df.printSchema()

spark.sql("CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS nyctaxi")
df.write.mode("overwrite").saveAsTable("nyctaxi.trip")
# Analyze the NYC Taxi data using Spark and notebooks

%%pyspark
df = spark.sql("""
   SELECT passenger_count,
       SUM(trip_distance) as SumTripDistance,
       AVG(trip_distance) as AvgTripDistance
   FROM nyctaxi.trip
   WHERE trip_distance > 0 AND passenger_count > 0
   GROUP BY passenger_count
   ORDER BY passenger_count
""") 
display(df)
df.write.saveAsTable("nyctaxi.passengercountstats")

from pyspark.sql import SparkSession
from pyspark.sql.types import *
from pyspark.sql.functions import col, year, month, dayofmonth, unix_timestamp, round, when
from datetime import datetime

# Replace your storage location
covid19casesdemographicsdf = spark.read.load('abfss://bsccsandboxdlgen2filesystem@bsccsandboxdlgen2acct.dfs.core.windows.net/bscc_datasets/covid19casesdemographics.csv', 
format='csv', header=True)

#covid19casesdemographicsdf = spark.read.load('abfss://bsccdemodlgen2filesystem@bsccdemodlgen2acct.dfs.core.windows.net/bscc_dataset/covid19casesdemographics.csv', 
#format='csv', header=True)

covid19casesdemographicsdf = covid19casesdemographicsdf.where(col('deaths') > 0)
covid19casesdemographicsdf = covid19casesdemographicsdf.where(col('demographic_category') == 'Gender')

spark.sql("CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS bcc_data_lake")
covid19casesdemographicsdf.repartition(4).write.mode("overwrite").saveAsTable("bcc_data_lake.covid_bygender")

print("Extracted & cleaned data")

#covid19casesdemographicsdf = covid19casesdemographicsdf.select(col("demographic_category"))

display(covid19casesdemographicsdf.limit(1000))

#covid19casesdemographicsdf.printSchema()

import pandas as pd

from pandas import read_csv
from pandas import set_option

# CAL TRANS DATA SET
path = 'abfss://rayfelipedlgen2filesystem@rayfelipedlgen2account.dfs.core.windows.net/Caltrans/traffic.csv'
headernames = ['DateTime', 'Junction', 'Vehicles', 'ID']
data = read_csv(path, names=headernames)
set_option('display.width', 100)
set_option('precision', 2)

print(data.head(10))
print(data.shape)
print(data.describe())

listA = ['Mon','Tue', 'Wed', 'Thu', 'Fri']
listB = ['Tue', 'Fri']
# Given lists
print("The given list:\n ",listA)
print("The list of values:\n ",listB)
# using indices
res = [listA.index(i) for i in listB]
# Result
print("The Match indices list is : ",res)

import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

x1 = [1, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 9]
y1 = [4, 7, 2, 4, 7, 8, 3]

x2 = [2, 4, 6, 8, 10]
y2 = [5, 6, 2, 6, 2]

plt.bar(x1, y1, label="Blue Bar", color='b')
plt.bar(x2, y2, label="Green Bar", color='g')
plt.plot()

plt.xlabel("bar number")
plt.ylabel("bar height")
plt.title("Bar Chart Example")
plt.legend()
plt.show()
